subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: LeBron James and Dwyane Wade are young and gifted enough to turn the page on the past, meet the demands of the day while Kobe Bryant remains stuck in a time warp.
snippet: LeBron James and Dwyane Wade are young and gifted enough to turn the page on the past, meet the demands of the day while Kobe Bryant remains stuck in a time warp.
